title: Bekenntnisse des Hochstaplers Felix Krull (5_5) DSR.mkv
description:
A German soldier sent to Paris during World War I. He casts aside his uniform and gets a job as an elevator operator. A handsome lug, pursued by virtually every female who enters his little compartment. But the lad is shy, and besides, he'd rather discuss anthropology.

Folge 5:

DarstellerInnen: John Moulder-Brown (Felix), Fernando Rey (Professor Kuckuck), Vera Tschechowa (Maria Pia), Giorgia Slowe (Zouzou), Tony Portacio (Hurtado), Albert Varela Silva (Direktor), Armando Cortez (Portier), Ulrich Beiger (Stewart), Rui Luis de Castro (Botschafter).
